title: Did Dems ask Payden to give up control of nuclear weapons?
subtitle: The President ' s critics have forged a message from the Democrats in the House of Representatives as evidence of the support of the two parties to strip him of his executive duties.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Because of the mental fitness of President Joe Biden, more than 30 Democrats in the United States House issued a letter on February 22, 2021, asking him to give up his authority as the only American capable of launching nuclear weapons.
